original_text: When you go into the land that the Lord your God is giving you, be careful! Do not learn to do the evil things that the nations who live there are doing.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주시는 땅에 들어가거든 너는 그 민족들의 가증한 행위를 본받지 말 것이니

sentences.original_text: When you go into the land
that the Lord your God is giving you
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주시는 땅

sentences.original_text: Do not learn to do the evil things
that the nations who live there are doing
